availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: U.S. Army ram fleet organized on November 1, 1862. Commander(s): Brigadier General Alfred Washington Ellet; Colonel Charles Rivers Ellet; Lieutenant Colonel John Alfred Ellet.

ab.bibl:
Barbara Brooks Tomblin, The Civil War on the Mississippi: Union Sailors, Gunboat Captains, and the Campaign to Control the River (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 2016), 172.
Scott Laidig, "The Fighting Ellets: Ingenuity, Courage, Nepotism and Corruption?" https://ehistory.osu.edu/articles/fighting-ellets-ingenuity-courage-nepotism-and-corruption-0 (accessed on December 21, 2020).
